original_text: While he was king, King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon attacked Judah. He took hold of King Jehoiakim. He tied bronze chains around him and he took him away to Babylon.
korean_text: 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살이 올라와서 그를 치고 그를 쇠사슬로 결박하여 바벨론으로 잡아가고

sentences.original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon attacked Judah
He took hold of King Jehoiakim
He tied bronze chains around him
and he took him away to Babylon
